org.apache.taverna.robundle

Class Bundles

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.taverna.robundle.Bundles
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DataBundles

    public class Bundles
extends Object
    Utility functions for dealing with RO bundles.

    The style of using this class is similar to that of Files. In fact, a RO bundle is implemented as a set of Paths.
